label: MITRETechnique
name: Supply Chain Compromise
description: Adversaries manipulate products or product delivery mechanisms prior to receipt by final consumer to achieve data or system compromise

label: MITRETechnique
name: Compromise Software Dependencies and Development Tools
description: Adversaries manipulate software dependencies and development tools to compromise software supply chain

label: MITRETechnique
name: Compromise Software Supply Chain
description: Adversaries manipulate application software prior to receipt by final consumer to achieve code execution

label: MITRETechnique
name: Compromise Hardware Supply Chain
description: Adversaries manipulate hardware components during production or delivery to compromise target systems

label: MITRETechnique
name: Valid Accounts
description: Adversaries obtain and abuse credentials of existing accounts as means of gaining initial access, persistence, or privilege escalation

label: MITRETechnique
name: Account Manipulation
description: Adversaries manipulate accounts to maintain access to victim systems by modifying credentials or permission groups

label: MITRETechnique
name: Impair Defenses
description: Adversaries prevent security tools from detecting or responding to their behavior by disabling or modifying defensive capabilities

label: MITRETechnique
name: Indicator Removal
description: Adversaries delete or modify artifacts generated on systems to remove evidence of their presence or hinder defenses

label: MITRETechnique
name: Exploit Public-Facing Application
description: Adversaries exploit software vulnerabilities in internet-facing applications to gain initial access to victim networks

label: MITRETechnique
name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
description: Adversaries abuse command and script interpreters to execute commands, scripts, or binaries on victim systems
